data.message: ❌ ERROR: FUTURE not found. • ❗️WARNING: Global ⛓ 🌎 System Update ◾️◾️◽️◽️◽️ Installation In Progress... • 🛰 SIGNAL: Hello 🌐 World! 👋 • WARNING: Systems under PRESSURE❗️ • ⚠️ NOTICE: The Rokkaku ⭕️ Group is actively working 🔨⛓ hard to implement their 'Great 21st Century 🚧 Project' by creating the problems ⚠️ needed to radically reshape Tokyo-to and the ⛓🌎 world. • COSMIC: Past, Present, Future... ⏰ TIME and 🌌 SPACE. • ⚠️ NOTICE: Utilizing his 💰 wealth, power and influence... Rokkaku seeks to wield total ⛓ control over the citizens of earth 🌎 using his sophisticated technologies, 🤖 robotics and 🦠 bio-weapons. • TWITTER: Be sure to follow @jetsetradiolive on Twitter! •
